catalog_info.title: Analysis I: Complex Function Theory
catalog_info.prereq: Anti-Req: Not to be taken in addition to Mathematics 55b.
catalog_info.description: Analytic functions of one complex variable: power series expansions, contour integrals, Cauchy's theorem, Laurent series and the residue theorem. Some applications to real analysis, including the evaluation of indefinite integrals. An introduction to some special functions.
